title: Man kept in jail for three more years because jail authorities were not able to open email attachment of the bail order
selftext:
Calling the case “an eye opener”, the Gujarat High Court slammed the prison authorities for a “serious lapse” on their part and for not abiding by the court’s order issued three years ago and awarded Thakor be paid compensation of Rs 100,000 within two weeks 

Source: [https://www.independent.co.uk/asia/india/chandanji-thakor-jailed-gujarat-email-error-b2419399.html](https://www.independent.co.uk/asia/india/chandanji-thakor-jailed-gujarat-email-error-b2419399.html)
